---
tags:
    - phrase
---

| P4 | m3 |
|---|---|
| C∆ | Eb∆ |
| Bb∆ | Db∆ |
| Ab∆ | B∆ |
| Gb∆ | A∆ |
| E∆ | G∆ |
| D∆ | F∆ |
| C∆ | ... |

全音ずつ降りていくのです。
